/opt/sw/intel18/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mpi/intel64/bin/mpiifort -fPIC -fPIC -cpp -fpp -O2 -qopenmp  -shared -nofor_main -Wl,-soname,libDiagnostics.so -o ../lib/libDiagnostics.so CMakeFiles/Diagnostics.dir/textual_diagnostic.f90.o CMakeFiles/Diagnostics.dir/silo_diagnostic.f90.o  -L/opt/sw/ScientificLibraries/Silo/4.11/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/sw/ScientificLibraries/Silo/4.11/lib:/home/reemh/eclipse-workspace/Backus_test/build/lib ../lib/libSilo.so -lsilo
